#0# Tadanulomikaṁ dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi tenahi bhikkhave
#1# saṅgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyakammaṁ karotu. Evañca

#3# [164] Atha kho saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ
#4# akāsi citto te gahapati khamāpetabboti. So saṅghena

#9# gahapatiṁ khamāpetunti. Te bhikkhū {undefined} bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
#10# Tenahi bhikkhave saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūtaṁ detu cittaṁ

#16# brahmadaṇḍoti. Pucchiṁ kho ahaṁ bhante bhagavantaṁ katamo pana

#0# Samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi. Athakho rañño udenassa

#0# Na kappati samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtiyānaṁ jātarūparajataṁ na sādiyanti

#4# āyasmatā yasena kākaṇḍakaputtena vuccamānā adaṁsuyeva saṅghassa

#6# vajjiputtakā bhikkhū tassā rattiyā ^a^ PTS. Vin II , 295 ^ea^ accayena taṁ hiraññaṁ bhikkhuggena { 1 Ma. Yu. bhikkhaggena.}

#0# Pariyesitabbanti vadāmīti evaṁvādī kirāhaṁ āyasmante upāsake

#0# Revato antevāsiṁ { 1 Ma. Yu. antevāsikaṁ.} sarabhāṇakaṁ bhikkhuṁ ajjhesissati so tvaṁ tassa
#1# bhikkhuno sarabhaññapariyosāne āyasmantaṁ revataṁ upasaṅkamitvā

#5# ajjhesi. Athakho āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto tassa

#11# pariharituṁ yattha aloṇikaṁ { 2 Ma. Yu. aloṇakaṁ.} bhavissati tattha paribhuñjissāmīti.
